course.title: ADM 3321 Consumer Behaviour (3 units)
course.desc: Synthesis of the behavioural analysis of the consumer (psychology, sociology, social psychology). Recent applications of behavioural theory will be investigated in light of the consumer's behaviour, individually and as mediated by group processes. Behavioural impact of the corporate and marketing strategies on the consumer.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: ADM 2320.
